entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
